00001 from geometry_msgs.msg import PoseStamped
00002 from move_base_msgs.msg import MoveBaseGoal
00003 import rospy
00004 
00005 
00006 class Navigation(object):
00007     def __init__(self, base_frame, world_frame, tf_listener, move_base_client):
00008         self._base_frame = base_frame
00009         self._world_frame = world_frame
00010         self._tf_listener = tf_listener
00011         self._move_base_client = move_base_client
00012 
00013     def go_to(self, pose_stamped):
00014         """Goes to a location in the world.
00015 
00016         Args:
00017           pose_stamped: geometry_msgs/PoseStamped. The location to go to.
00018         """
00019         self._move_base_client.wait_for_server()
00020         goal = MoveBaseGoal()
00021         goal.target_pose = pose_stamped
00022         self._move_base_client.send_goal(goal)
00023         self._move_base_client.wait_for_result()
00024 
00025     def get_current_location(self):
00026         """Returns the location of the robot in the world frame.
00027 
00028         Returns: geometry_msgs/PoseStamped. The pose of the robot in the world
00029           frame, or None if it couldn't figure out its location.
00030         """
00031         try:
00032             pose_stamped = PoseStamped()
00033             pose_stamped.header.frame_id = self._base_frame
00034             pose_stamped.header.stamp = rospy.Time(0)
00035             pose_stamped.pose.position.x = 0
00036             pose_stamped.pose.position.y = 0
00037             pose_stamped.pose.position.z = 0
00038             pose_stamped.pose.orientation.w = 1
00039             pose_stamped.pose.orientation.x = 0
00040             pose_stamped.pose.orientation.y = 0
00041             pose_stamped.pose.orientation.z = 0
00042             current_location = self._tf_listener.transformPose(
00043                 self._world_frame, pose_stamped)
00044             return current_location
00045         except Exception as e:
00046             rospy.logerr(
00047                 'Failed to get current pose in world frame {}.'.format(
00048                     self._world_frame))
00049             rospy.logerr(e)
00050             return None
